problem: 如图,一艘货轮由A地沿北偏东45°方向航行到C地,在C地改变航向航行到B地,此时观测到C地位于B地北偏西63°方向上,则∠C的度数为()
answer: 【解答】解:由题意作图如下∠DAC=45°,∠CBE=63°,由平行线的性质可得∠ACF=∠DAC=45°,∠BCF=∠CBE=63°,∴∠ACB=∠ACF+∠BCF=45°+63°=108°,
comment: 本题考查了方位角,熟练掌握平行线的性质是解题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, a freighter sails from A to C in the direction N_0 to the east by north, and changes course to B at C. At this time, it is observed that C is located in the direction of N_1 to the west of B, and then ∠C The degree is ()
